original_title: Dem deutschen Volke - Eine parlamentarische Spurensuche: Vom Reichstag zum Bundestag
overview: The documentary about the Reichstag-Building was screened open-air and for free near the Reichstag in Berlin between June and October 2012 in combination with a light and sound show.
title: Dem deutschen Volke - Eine parlamentarische Spurensuche: Vom Reichstag zum Bundestag
